notes:
## Implementation Summary

### What was done
- Scaffolded Next.js 16.x (React 19.x) project via create-next-app
- Configured with App Router, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS 4, ESLint, Turbopack
- Replaced default Geist fonts with Inter (Libre Baskerville added in theme task)
- Stripped boilerplate to minimal SafeReads placeholder page
- Installed all core dependencies: convex, @clerk/nextjs, @radix-ui/* (dialog, dropdown-menu, slider, switch, tabs, tooltip), lucide-react, openai
- Created directory structure per CLAUDE.md architecture

### Key decisions
- Used Inter as base font (not Geist) to align with bookish theme
- Kept Tailwind theme minimal — dedicated issue SafeReads-zr4 handles bookish theme
- Included Turbopack for dev performance
- Installed broad set of Radix UI primitives upfront to avoid repeated installs

### Files modified
- package.json (new)
- src/app/layout.tsx (new — minimal with Inter font)
- src/app/page.tsx (new — minimal SafeReads placeholder)
- src/app/globals.css (new — minimal Tailwind import)
- next.config.ts, tsconfig.json, eslint.config.mjs, postcss.config.mjs (new — scaffold defaults)
- convex/lib/.gitkeep, src/components/.gitkeep (new — directory placeholders)

### Caveats
- next-env.d.ts is gitignored (auto-generated) — this is correct
- No Convex schema or .env.local yet (SafeReads-1tc)
- No Tailwind theme customization yet (SafeReads-zr4)
